channel.title: Muting
channel.description:
How do i mute on HYIASCAPE V2
because when i press report abuse and on tht 13th rule wer it says mute player 4 48h it just selects it and dont do anything,
also at tope it says moderator option: Mute player for 48 hours <off>

item.title: Muting
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

[quote=“Jordiescape, post:4, topic:201707”][quote author=si force link=topic=266371.msg2201130#msg2201130 date=1208815964]
you can either do what silabmods said,

Or make a command,

Or do it via the report abuse system,

Or just tell them to shut the fuck up.
[/quote]
SHUT UP NOOB.
LeScape is banned???[/quote]

Check msn

Read full topic
